transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hi hello. Good afternoon sir.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Haan ji sir, good afternoon sir.
Customer: Haan ji boliye ji.
Executive: Sir, main Nitish baat kar raha hu sir IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan ji boliye.
Executive: Aur sab kaise hain sir, badhiya hain?
Customer: Haan, theek hai.
Executive: Okay sir, okay. Sir kuch buylead mila sir aapko?
Customer: Buylead to aayi hai, ek do li hai maine.
Executive: Kya sir?
Customer: Hello. Boliye.
Executive: To kuch jaise ki by sab ek wo wali 1000 piece ki aayi thi sir wo to sold out hi ho gayi thi.
Customer: Haan ji. Mil gayi maine. Haan.
Executive: Yes sir, yes sir. To sir isme se abhi
Customer: Haan, aapko bata de raha hu.
Executive: Actually na sir aapka matlab concern raise ho pada hai to ye main close kar du sir?
Customer: Nahi close nahi karna abhi.
Executive: Close nahi karna hai?
Customer: Nahi. Isko open rehne do jitni der meri problem puri nahi hoti.
Executive: Kya sir? Inhone website nahi banayi hamari kuch?
Customer: Okay okay. Notification to aata hoga na sir buylead aati hai to.
Customer: Nahi sir, sold out aati hai, nahi aa rahi kuch bhi.
Executive: Sold out ho jati hai.
Customer: Notification jo hai wo on kar rakhe hai na sir aapne?
Customer: Haan ji, haan ji, haan ji.
Executive: Haan, to jaise jaise agar notification aati hai just turant notification aayi sir aur turant aap consume karna chahte hain tab bhi sold out ho jati hai?
Customer: Haan ji, usi time sold out ho jati hai.
Executive: Usi time sold out ho jati hai?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Okay okay. Aur kam quantity ki buylead consume nahi karna hai, yahi na? Yes. I mean ye issue hai.
Executive: Kyunki ye 10-20 wali piece to kaafi sari 50 piece wali kaafi sari aa rakhi hai.
Customer: Wo nahi dekh sakte hum.
Executive: Usme nahi karna hai.
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: Jaise ki agar main baat karu sir Punjab, Haryana.
Executive: Ek second.
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Ye Askar wale ki jo aa rakhi hai to isme karna hai sir? But ye location issue hai sir aapki Karnataka ki hai ye buylead.
Customer: Nahi, wo nahi karna.
Executive: Wo nahi karna hai. Aapne Rajasthan aur Gujarat ko not list fir se location add kar dijiye na sir waha ki buylead nahi aayegi aapke paas.
Customer: Chalo koi baat nahi sir. Maharashtra ki.
Customer: Haan. Setting mein aapko jaani hai.
Customer: Pata pata lag jayega kar dunga.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ye kar denge okay sir. Wo hamari website ka kya bana website nahi bani?
Executive: Kya sir?
Customer: Website to banayi nahi aapne.
Executive: Aapki website?
Customer: Hello. Telephone bhi nahi lag rahi.
Executive: Sir ye aapki website wali service nahi hai na, ye to aapki basic service hai sir abhi IndiaMART pe.
Customer: 40000 bhaiya bhaiya basic liya hai maine.
Executive: Haan basic ke liye hai na, basic service hai ye aapki.
Customer: Isme website nahi banegi?
Executive: Nahi website wali service jo hoti hai na sir wo alag service hoti hai na.
Customer: Wo hai nahi service, wo show to hona chahiye.
Executive: Kya sir?
Customer: Google mein hum search karenge to koi aayega nahi hamara Shri Krishna and company?
Executive: Haan to wo to aa raha hai sir aapki company ka to naam show ho raha hai na. Haan aa raha hai, search karo aap aa raha hai batao mujhe.
Executive: Ek second, main search kar raha hu.
Executive: Ye jaise ki maan ke chaliye form Askar side wali service hai ya fir stainless steel wali hai Firozpur mein se search kiye aapne?
Customer: Main sir ye aap bol raha hu Shri Krishna and company daliye jo bhi aapne banaya hua hai IndiaMART.com wo daliye isme hamari company aati hai.
Executive: Ek second. Haan sir aapki company aa rahi hai.
Customer: Firozpur location. Kal maine dekha tha kal nahi aa rahi thi.
Executive: Nahi aa rahi hai, main aapko share kar du kya?
Customer: Chalo koi baat nahi main dekh leta hu. Okay? Haan.
Executive: Jaise jo website wali service hoti hai na sir wo alag hoti hai ek service hoti hai wo alag hoti hai. Free time mein baat karna.
Customer: Tum solve kar lo sir.
Executive: Koi baat nahi main aake call karunga aapko. Meri ye problem pehle solve karo fir call karna aap. Uske pehle call na karna mujhe ye jitni der problem solve nahi hoti. Understand?
Executive: Sir ye call to mujhe karna hoga sir kyunki main aapki jo. Main aisi call receive nahi bhaiya karunga. Theek hai jitni der meri complaint open rahegi complaint ko solution nahi milta main aapki IndiaMART ki aisi ki taisi kar dunga na aap yaad rakhoge. Itna main feedback aapko dunga na koi service nahi bech sakte aap.
Executive: Sir isme feedback ki kya baat hai. Main video bana ke dal raha hu YouTube mein. Aage koi service milega ye guarantee hai ye jitni der meri problem solve nahi hoti.
Executive: Isme sir problem solution. Social media dekhna main 25000 lag raha hai social media mein 25000 unko de dunga aapki sari viral kar dega wo ye IndiaMART fraud.
Executive: IndiaMART fraud viral hai sir tab kal kal Ashok ji ne teen char din ka time diya main next week mein kar dena maine.
Customer: IndiaMART 5 saal ki company hai 5 saal ki company hai. Agar meri problem solve na hui to main aapko bhi service nahi dunga ye dhyan rakhna bas ab iske jada kuch nahi bol sakta phone kato aap.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is facing issues with buyleads.

- Wants only high quantity buyleads.

- Website not created as promised.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to resolve the buylead issue.

- Executive confirmed company listing on IndiaMART.

- Explained website service is different from basic service.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call after issue resolution.



Alert (If Any):

fraud

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, website, subscription, fraud
